title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-1.8 - Manuals or bulletins of procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-1.8 - Manuals or bulletins of procedure

State Regulations

Procedures to be employed by local agencies in
connection with the application for State aid, acquisition of property, design
and construction of the project, letting of contracts, financing, insurance, operation of the project, etc., are set forth in the Division of Housing
manuals of procedure or bulletins[FN*], as amended from time to time, which
should be consulted for guidance. [FN*] See Subchapters B and C of this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1640-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
